alert.note: Alert for Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 3:38AM PST until January 12 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Colfax, Oakesdale, La Crosse, Tekoa, Uniontown, Rosalia, and Pullman. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 AM PST this morning. For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on winter travel conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
